site.name: Fusion AI Studio
site.description: AI-powered fashion photography platform for e-commerce. Professional product photos without physical studio. Supports hijab models, accessories, flat lay, and style transfer.

pages.title: Fusion AI Studio - AI Fashion Photography
pages.description: Professional AI-powered fashion photography for e-commerce. Generate studio-quality product photos instantly.
use_cases: Generate professional product photos without physical studio
Create diverse model photography with hijab support
Recreate brand scenes with your products
Apply artistic styles to product images

pages.title: AI Photography Services
pages.description: 6 specialized AI photography services: Complete Outfit, Scene Recreation, Style Transfer, Accessories, Color Collection, and Flat Lay.

pages.title: Complete Outfit Photography
pages.description: AI model wearing your garments. Choose model category (woman, man, girl, boy, teen, child), hijab options, backgrounds, and professional photography parameters.
pages.target_use: Fashion brands, clothing stores, online boutiques

pages.title: Scene Recreation Service
pages.description: Recreate brand reference photos with your products. Upload a reference scene, AI analyzes it, and recreates it with your garments.
pages.target_use: Brand consistency, lookbook creation, campaign matching

pages.title: Style Transfer Photography
pages.description: Apply artistic styles and moods from reference images to your product photos. Create unique, stylized product photography.
pages.target_use: Creative campaigns, artistic product photos, unique branding

pages.title: Accessories Photography
pages.description: Professional photography for jewelry and accessories: rings, earrings, bracelets, necklaces, anklets, watches.
pages.target_use: Jewelry stores, accessory brands, fashion accessories

pages.title: Color Collection Display
pages.description: Showcase multiple color variants of your products. Display scenarios: on-arm, hanging rack, folded stack, laid out.

pages.title: Flat Lay Photography
pages.description: Overhead product photography with multiple items. Arrangements: grid, scattered, circular, diagonal.
pages.target_use: Instagram content, product collections, lifestyle shots

pages.title: Pricing Plans
pages.description: Flexible pricing tiers for AI photography services. Free tier available. Plans include: Free, Basic, Pro, Enterprise.

pages.title: User Gallery
pages.description: Browse and manage your generated AI photos. Filter by service type, download, share, or delete.

pages.title: Portfolio Showcase
pages.description: Example gallery showcasing AI-generated fashion photography. See what's possible with Fusion AI.

pages.title: Blog & Resources
pages.description: Fashion photography tips, AI photography guides, e-commerce best practices, and platform updates.

pages.title: About Fusion AI
pages.description: Learn about our AI fashion photography platform, mission, and team.

pages.title: Contact Us
pages.description: Get in touch with Fusion AI support team. Sales inquiries, technical support, partnerships.

pages.title: Help Center
pages.description: Tutorials, guides, and help documentation for using Fusion AI photography services.

pages.title: Frequently Asked Questions
pages.description: Common questions about AI fashion photography, pricing, features, and technical details.

pages.title: API Documentation
pages.description: Developer documentation for Fusion AI API. Integrate AI photography into your platform.

use_cases: Fashion brands generate 100+ product photos daily
E-commerce stores create consistent brand photography
Marketing agencies produce campaign visuals instantly
Small businesses get professional photos without studio costs
